context.commit_message:
âœ¨ Add retroactive manifest creation for legacy installations

Enhanced cleanup system to handle installations created before manifest tracking.
When no manifest is found, the system offers to scan the installation and create
a retroactive manifest by comparing with the template structure.

Features:
- Automatic detection of super-agents files by template comparison
- SHA256 hash calculation for file integrity tracking
- Support for additional files not in template (.mcp.json, CLAUDE.md, etc.)
- Graceful fallback when rich library not available
- User-friendly prompts with clear explanations

This allows cleanup of ANY super-agents installation, regardless of when it was created.
